transcript:
Therapist: You've shown a lot of insight and willingness to work on these challenges, Priya. I'm confident that with continued practice, you'll start to see improvements in your ability to communicate your needs and manage anxiety.

Since we have some time left in our session today, I'd like to explore another strategy that can be helpful for managing anxiety and challenging negative thoughts. It's called the "downward arrow" technique. Are you familiar with this technique?

Patient: I don't think so. Can you explain it to me?
